transcript: I learned really young from really good mentors that the only way to beat a hater was to just win like there is no retaliation there's no retribution there's no actual Revenge so I have beaten a lot of business people in the field people that I saw as competitors like where it was very clear we're going head-to-head for a market what's really weird is that when you actually win when someone actually goes out of business it's like not cool you don't like spit on their corpse you're just like oh
